result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sheila M Dahms

records.addlTxt: Letters from Timothy Kubsch to Judge and DA
Further proceedings on November 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Order to Withdraw.
Attorney Carl Knepel is allowed to withdraw as counsel.
Scheduling conference on October 21, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Defendant opts in for text message reminders.

$50.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.   
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail Bond. 
--Timothy Kubsch, 2009 Waldo Blvd., Manitowoc, WI  54220.

Prosecuting attorney Marconi De Franca Barros appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sheila M Dahms appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Carl W Knepel in court for Sheila M Dahms. 
Defense waives reading of the complaint and reserves all other jurisdictional rights and objections. 
Not guilty plea(s).  Jury calendar. 
Offer deadline 08-05-2022.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Order to Seal Probable Cause Statement.
The original document was titled: Probable cause statement /judicial determination
The original history event date is: 06-24-2022
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of disorderly conduct-dvo.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 06-30-22 at 10:30 a.m. B-15.  Bail is set at $50.00 cash with the conditions that she provide an address to the Clerk of Court office, in writing, within 48 hours of release, that she have no contact with T.L.K., DOB: 03-28-1969 and maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs.   Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnished issued.  Copy filed.
Minutes.
